document_data.name: Rasa Parhek
document_data.mainbody: Princess '''Rasa Parhek''' was an ill-fated [[Amn]]ian daughter of the [[Parhek]] dynasty.
document_data.Relationships: Rasa was the daughter of King [[Dhanar Parhek]], the twin of Prince [[Dhanar Parhek (prince)|Dhanar the Younger]], and the elder sister of Prince [[Malek Parhek (prince)|Malek the Coinmage]]. She married [[Dornar Steelsar]], and they had their children [[Choris Steelsar|Choris]], [[Rosa Steelsar|Rosa]], [[Rohav Steelsar|Rohav]], and [[Rhothar Steelsar|Rhothar]].
document_data.History: Rasa was moved as a child to [[Silverymoon]] after her father was killed and Amn fell into civil war. Living under the protection of Lady [[Alustriel Silverhand]], she married Dornar Steelsar and had four children together. They were eventually found by Amnian assassins, however, and in the {{YearlinkName|1297}}, she was forced to flee the city with Rhothar while Dornar and Choris fought to the death, and Rohav was kidnapped. She was believed to have died later in [[1302 DR]].
